page.title: 20HOUSING
page.content: ALMOST ALL THE HOUSES IN THE AREA ARE OWNED BY THE ESTATE AND ARE OCCUPIED AS TIED HOUSES. THERE IS ONLY 1 LOCAL AUTHORITY HOUSE(SCHOOL HOUSE). EVERY HOUSE HAS A GARDEN AND BATHROOM AND ARE ALL IN VERY GOOD CONDITION. PLANNING PERMISSION HAS JUST BEEN GRANTED FOR THE ERECTION OF AN ADDITIONAL 10 HOUSES.THESE WILL BE USED AS HOLIDAY HOMES. IT IS MOST LIKELY THAT IN THE NEXT FEW YEARS A LARGE NUMBER OF OTHER HOUSES WILL BE BUILT. ALL THE HOUSES WITH THE EXCEPTION OF THE LODGES ARE OF THE BUNGALOW OR COTTAGE STYLE.THEY ARE STONE BUILT WITH SLATE ROOFS. NONE OF THE HOUSES HAS CENTRAL HEATING OR DOUBLE GLAZING. THERE IS NO UNDER STANDARD HOUSING IN THE AREA.
